LoanApplicant.name: LoanApplicant
LoanApplicant.description: Represents details of the borrower or co-borrower for the loan application.

ApplicantExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable).

DependentsAge.description: Ages of borrower's dependents in a comma-separated list.

HasMilitaryService.description: Indicates whether the borrow is serving in the United States Armed Forces or the borrower or the borrower's deceased spouse served in the past.

IsActiveMilitary.description: Indicates whether borrower is currently on active duty with the United States Armed Forces.

IsJointCredit.description: Indicates whether borrower is applying for joint credit.

IsSurvivingMilitarySpouse.description: Indicates whether borrower is a surviving spouse of a veteran.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicationId.description: Loan application associated with this borrower.

MilitaryTourExpirationMonth.description: Month that borrower's tour of service expires.

MilitaryTourExpirationYear.description: Year that borrower's tour of service expires.

OtherAsianRaceSubType.description: Borrower's Asian race if other is specified.

OtherEthnicitySubType.description: Borrower's ethnicity if other is selected.

OtherPacIslandSubType.description: Borrower's native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander race if other is specified.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

PacIslandSubType.description: Borrower's native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander race.

TribeName.description: Name of borrower's enrolled or principal tribe.

WasActiveMilitary.description: Indicates whether borrower is currently retired, discharged, or separated from active military duty.

WasNonActivatedService.description: Indicates whether borrower's only military service was as a non-activated Reserve soldier or as a non-activated member of the National Guard.
